title: US sanctions Turkish ministries, senior officials over offensive in Syria
text:
Xinhua | Updated: 2019-10-15 04:41

US President Donald Trump speaks about Turkey and Syria during a formal signing ceremony for the US-Japan Trade Agreement at the White House in Washington, Oct 7, 2019. [Photo/Agencies]

WASHINGTON - US Treasury announced on Monday that it has imposed sanctions on two ministries and three senior Turkish government officials in response to Turkey's military operations in Syria.

Turkey's Ministry of National Defense and the Ministry of Energy and Natural Resources, as well as the heads of the two ministries and the minister of the Interior, are blacklisted as a result of today's action, the Treasury said in a statement.
description: WASHINGTON - US Treasury announced on Monday that it has imposed sanctions on two ministries and three senior Turkish government officials in response to Turkey's military operations in Syria.
